dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: A corpus containing about 960 hours of read speech data for training, and 4 development and test sets ({dev, test}- {clean, other}), where other sets are more acoustically challenging.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:creator: Yongqiang Wang
Abdelrahman Mohamed
Duc Le
Chunxi Liu
Alex Xiao
Jay Mahadeokar
Hongzhao Huang
Andros Tjandra
Xiaohui Zhang
Frank Zhang
Christian Fuegen
Geoffrey Zweig
Michael L. Seltzer
dcterms:description: A large dataset consisting of 13.7K hours of videos (from 941.6K video clips) used for English video ASR experiments. The dataset includes a development set of about 9 hours and three test sets: a curated set, a clean set, and a noisy set.
dcterms:title: Internal English Video ASR Dataset
